001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint;
004import jakarta.inject.Inject;
005import jakarta.inject.Named;
006import org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LoggerContext;
007import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory;
008import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
009
010@Service
011public class FilePersistentSubscriberCheckpointFactory
012    implements Factory<PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint>
013{
014    private final LoggerContext loggerContext;
015
016    @Inject
017    public FilePersistentSubscriberCheckpointFactory(LoggerContext loggerContext) {
018        this.loggerContext = loggerContext;
019    }
020
021    @Override
022    @Named("file")
023    public PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint provide() {
024        return new FilePersistentSubscriberCheckpoint(loggerContext.getLogger(FilePersistentSubscriberCheckpoint.class));
025    }
026
027    @Override
028    public void dispose(PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint instance) {
029
030    }
031}
